name: Arena Of Legends
description:
A Real-Time-Strategy, Fight against your enemy's in 1V1 battle and lead your troops to victory to be one of the Legends

(The Game is still in Development and you might encounter Issues Bug/Glitch i appreciate the time you will spend on this game to make it better thanks)

Online Multiplayer is Available.
